attributes.additional_details: Appointment of an Independent Prosecutor and fully fund the Prosecutor's office, for the purpose of investigating Ministerial Misconduct (under any legal standard) and recommending prosecution or censure as and if warranted.  Referral to this Office of allegations and questions surrounding Ministerial Relations with and conduct in office toward A4e, Atos, McKensie, donors, workfare, NHS Reform, screening of disabled, defence contracts, medical care contracts, hospital contracts, tax avoidance, transparency.
